body:
I would like to setup an Amazon's VPC gateway to my server. I do not have a Cisco or Juniper router, but found the [OpenSolaris VPC Gateway](http://kenai.com/projects/osolvpc), supposedly addressing this use case (see their [wiki](http://kenai.com/projects/osolvpc/pages/Home) for details).

Anyone tried to build this on Linux?
title: How to setup an Amazon VPC gateway without a Cisco/Juniper router?
